messages.title: 3 POSITIVE REASONS TO VOTE FOR ESTHER MCVEY
messages.content: Every child deserves access to the best education. Police that engage with the community and ensure its safety. NHS services that are open to all and provide the best care available.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Every child deserves access to the best education.
Police that engage with the community and ensure its safety.
NHS services that are open to all and provide the best care available.

issues.education: Esther McVey believes every child deserves access to the best education.
issues.health: Esther McVey wants NHS services that are open to all and provide the best care available.

politicalExperience.achievements: Esther McVey has a proven track record as a local campaigner, fighting for local post offices, against library and leisure centre closures as well as championing local charities and community groups.

contactInformation.address: 15A Grange Road, West Kirby, Wirral, CH48 4DY

images.caption: Esther McVey engaging with the community of Wirral
